    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect​(int startingPoint,
              int reciprocalPosition,
              int distMin,
              int distMax,
              int diversity,
              int what,
              int optionality,
              int whoToMove,
              int whereToMove,
              int whoToDamage,
              int damageNumber,
              int markNumber,
              int setTempSquare)
        builds an effect from all its attributes
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - starting point code
        reciprocalPosition - reciprocal position code
        distMin - minimum distance
        distMax - maximum distance
        diversity - diversity code
        what - nature of target code
        optionality - optionality code
        whoToMove - who to move code
        whereToMove - where to move code
        whoToDamage - who to damage code
        damageNumber - number of damages to inflict
        markNumber - number of marks to give
        setTempSquare - square to save in temp - code

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • start

        public void start​(Player p,
                  Match m)
           throws ApplyEffectImmediatelyException
        starts the effect and sets selectable lists from effect's criteria
        Parameters:
        p - player "source" of the effect
        m - match of the game
        Throws:
        ApplyEffectImmediatelyException - if effect has to apply itself

      • applyOn

        public Effect applyOn​(Player source,
                      Player targetP,
                      Square targetS,
                      Match m)
        applyes from source to target player or square the effect
        Parameters:
        source - source of the effect
        targetP - nullable player target
        targetS - nullable square target
        m - match
        Returns:
        effect to add to effect list
